channel.title: The Odyssey ~NEW PRIVATE SERVER~ [BETA]
channel.description:
[size=18pt]The Odyssey [BETA][/size] Well, i gave this alot of thought of devloping a private server called: The Odyssey, and some of you know that this is a title of a book by Homer that talks about all sorts of adventures and mythical gods and monsters which i thought if would be a good idea naming it The Odyssey, Currently we are looking for server coder's and staff member's.
[b]Feature's:[/b]
[ul][li][s]DELETED: Player Housing[/s], Castle Wars Point's Shop, and more.[/li] [li]Wilderness Pking: Varrock Pk, Falador Pk, Lumbridge Pk, and more.[/li] [li]Mini-Games: Castle Wars, Barrbarian Assualt, and more.[/li] [li]Payed: Vip System,Weapon Shop,Stat Shop, and more.[/li] [li]More things will follow if Requested.[/li][/ul]
[b]Staff:[/b]
[ul][li]Owner:Jordan:RSName::Odysseus[/li] [li]Co-Owner:Cody:RSName::Spotter[/li] [li]Developer:Andrew:RSName::Sparrowmg1[/li][/ul]
[b]Update's[/b]
[ul][li]10/16/2010: Starting of The Odyssey [/li] [li]10/21/2010: Completed: The Odyssey Home Area"Entrana"[/li] [li]10/21/2010: DELETED: [s]Player Housing "Construction"[/s][/li] [li]10/21/2010: Completed: Pking Area's "Varrock, EdgeVille"[/li] [li]10/21/2010: Completed: Added Npc's "Falador,Varrock,Lumbridge"[/li] [li]10/21/2010: Completed: Some Quest's [/li] [li]10/21/2010: Completed: Vip System "Premium Member" [/li][/ul]
[b]Server Properties:[/b]
[ul][li]Base: DELTA - OLD SCHOOL [/li][li]Server V317[/li] [li]Webclient [Website Coming Soon] & Downloadable Client : *
Downloadable Client Virus Scan Results: [url=http://www.virustotal.com/file-scan/report.html?id=aa90a2fc0193f8ca616f9bc5890963bf9721b53f828861c6a6b1c6393a5e21ba-1287796269]http://www.virustotal.com/file-scan/report.html?id=aa90a2fc0193f8ca616f9bc5890963bf9721b53f828861c6a6b1c6393a5e21ba-1287796269[/url]
[b]Screen Shot's:[/b] [list] [li]Coming Soon[/li] [/list]
[b]We are not looking for staff at this moment until our server is in the Beta Faze[/b] [b]Please leave idea's behind for future development[/b] [b]Contact:[/b] [list] [li]Sparrowmg@hotmail.com[/li] [li]Thanks, The Oddssey Team[/li] [/list][/ul]

item.title: The Odyssey ~NEW PRIVATE SERVER~ [BETA]
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Advertising your client download isn’t allowed, secondly a virus scan for your client is redundant, a virus scanner can’t pickup malicious byte code/source code.

Read full topic

If the client doesn’t work please post saying “[size=18pt]BITCH THE CLIENT DOESNT WORK[/size]”

Don’t ask why i added the [size=18pt]bitch[/size] part it gets me [size=36pt]motivated[/size] :]

@sparrowmg1 wrote:

[size=18pt]The Odyssey [BETA][/size]
Well, i gave this alot of thought of devloping a private server called: The Odyssey, and some of you know that this is a title of a book by Homer that talks about all sorts of adventures and mythical gods and monsters which i thought if would be a good idea naming it The Odyssey, Currently we are looking for server coder’s and staff member’s.
